search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where sourcetype=pihole DNS.message_type=query by DNS.query | rename DNS.* as * | sort 10 -count

| tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where sourcetype=pihole DNS.message_type=response DNS.reply_code="Query Refused" by DNS.query | rename DNS.* as * | sort 10 -count

| tstats local=f prestats=t summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where sourcetype=pihole DNS.message_type=query by _time, DNS.src | rename DNS.* as * | timechart useother=f count by src

panel.title: Blocked Queryies by Source over Time

search.query: | tstats local=f prestats=t summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t count from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where sourcetype=pihole DNS.message_type=response DNS.reply_code="Query Refused" by _time, DNS.src | rename DNS.* as * | timechart useother=f count by src

| tstats summariesonly=t allow_old_summaries=t max(_time) as _time, values(DNS.dest) as "Forwarded Destination" values(DNS.message_type) as "Message Type", values(DNS.record_type) as "Query Type", values(DNS.answer) as Answer, values(DNS.reply_code) as "Reply Code" from datamodel=Network_Resolution.DNS where sourcetype=pihole DNS.query!="unknown" by DNS.transaction_id, DNS.query, DNS.src | rename DNS.* as * | rename query as Query, src as Source, transaction_id as "Transaction ID" | eval answer=if(answer=="0.0.0.0","Pi-Holed!",answer) | sort -_time | fields _time, Query, Source, "Forwarded Destination", "Message Type", "Query Type", Answer, "Reply Code", "Transaction ID"
